description:
To provide an insight into the quality of software that is available, we have compiled a list of 13 high-quality web server performance testing tools that offer accurate and reliable benchmarking.

The post Top 13 Web Server Performance Testing Tools appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Top 13 Web Server Performance Testing Tools

description:
JupyterLab is an open-source web-based interactive development environment that extends the classic Jupyter Notebook experience, providing a more flexible and powerful interface for data science and scientific computing tasks. In this guide, you’ll learn how to install Jupyter on Ubuntu 24.04. You’ll install and secure Jupyter with password authentication. Then you’ll install Nginx and configure […]

The post How to Install JupyterLab on Ubuntu 24.04 appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Install JupyterLab on Ubuntu 24.04

description:
Maybe it’s just an oversight, but the European Commission’s draft of projects for next year fails to mention the NGI Zero Commons Fund, an important source of funding for FOSS projects.

The post Is the European Commission Dropping Support for Important Open-Source Funding? appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Is the European Commission Dropping Support for Important Open-Source Funding?

description:
Carl Richell, founder and CEO of System76, has announced the first alpha release of Pop!_OS 24.04 with COSMIC DE will launch on August 8th.

The post Pop!_OS 24.04 With COSMIC Alpha Release Date Announced appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Pop!_OS 24.04 With COSMIC Alpha Release Date Announced

description:
LZ4 1.10 compression algorithm released with multithreading, dramatically improving compression speeds by up to 8 times.

The post LZ4 1.10 Lossless Compression Algorithm Released appeared first on Linux Today.
title: LZ4 1.10 Lossless Compression Algorithm Released

description:
Pulsar 1.119, a free and open-source cross-platform code editor, brings macOS and Linux enhancements, improved code features, and more.

The post Pulsar 1.119 Code Editor Brings Refined Tools and Fixes appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Pulsar 1.119 Code Editor Brings Refined Tools and Fixes
